Center for Human Rights and Global Justice Twitter
Center for Human Rights and Global Justice Twitter

Twitter feed for the Center for Human Rights and Global Justice at NYU Law. Tweet topics include global human rights, mass surveillance, inequality in health and wealth, tax justice, and job postings.
